 37// Forward.
 38template <dimension_type Dim,
 39	  typename       MapT>
 40class Create_par_expr;
 41
 42// Forward.
 43template <dimension_type Dim,
 44	  typename       MapT,
 45	  typename       BlockT>
 46typename Combine_return_type<Create_par_expr<Dim, MapT>, BlockT>::type
 47get_par_expr_block(
 48  MapT const&   map,
 49  BlockT const& block);
 50
 51
 52
 53template <dimension_type Dim,
 54	  typename       MapT,
 55	  typename       BlockT>
 56class Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT, Peb_reorg_tag> : Non_copyable
 57{
 58public:
 59  static dimension_type const dim = Dim;
 60
 61  typedef typename BlockT::value_type           value_type;
 62  typedef typename BlockT::reference_type       reference_type;
 63  typedef typename BlockT::const_reference_type const_reference_type;
 64  typedef MapT                                  map_type;
 65
 66  // The layout of the reorg block should have the same dimension-
 67  // order and complex format as the source block.  Packing format
 68  // should either be unit-stride-dense or unit-stride-aligned.
 69  // It should not be taken directly from BlockT since it may have
 70  // a non realizable packing format such as Stride_unknown.
 71  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::order_type        order_type;
 72  typedef Stride_unit_dense                                pack_type;
 73  typedef typename Block_layout<BlockT>::complex_type      complex_type;
 74  typedef Layout<Dim, order_type, pack_type, complex_type> layout_type;
 75
 76#if VSIP_IMPL_PAR_SERVICE == 0 || VSIP_IMPL_PAR_SERVICE == 1
 77  typedef Fast_block<Dim, value_type, layout_type>  local_block_type;
 78  typedef Distributed_block<local_block_type, MapT> dst_block_type;
 79#else
 80  typedef Pas_block<Dim, value_type, order_type, MapT> dst_block_type;
 81  typedef typename dst_block_type::local_block_type   local_block_type;
 82#endif
 83  typedef typename View_block_storage<local_block_type>::plain_type
 84                                                local_block_ret_type;
 85
 86  typedef typename View_of_dim<Dim, value_type, dst_block_type>::type
 87		dst_view_type;
 88  typedef typename View_of_dim<Dim, value_type, BlockT>::const_type
 89		src_view_type;
 90
 91  typedef typename
 92    Choose_par_assign_impl<Dim, dst_block_type, BlockT, false>::type
 93    par_assign_type;
 94
 95
 96public:
 97  Par_expr_block(MapT const& map, BlockT const& block);
 98  ~Par_expr_block() {}
 99
100  void exec() { this->assign_(); }
101
102  // Accessors.
103public:
104  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return src_.block().size(); }
105  length_type size(dimension_type blk_dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
106  { return src_.block().size(blk_dim, d); }
107
108  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
109  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
110
111  // Distributed Accessors
112public:
113  local_block_type& get_local_block() const
114    { return dst_block_->get_local_block(); }
115
116  // Member data.
117private:
118  MapT const&     map_;
119  Domain<Dim>     dom_;
120  Ref_counted_ptr<dst_block_type> dst_block_;
121  dst_view_type   dst_;
122  src_view_type   src_;
123  Par_assign<Dim, value_type, value_type, dst_block_type, BlockT,
124             par_assign_type>
125		  assign_;
126};
127
128
129
130template <dimension_type Dim,
131	  typename       MapT,
132	  typename       BlockT>
133class Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT, Peb_reuse_tag> : Non_copyable
134{
135public:
136  static dimension_type const dim = Dim;
137
138  typedef typename BlockT::value_type           value_type;
139  typedef typename BlockT::reference_type       reference_type;
140  typedef typename BlockT::const_reference_type const_reference_type;
141  typedef MapT                                  map_type;
142
143
144  typedef BlockT const                              local_block_type;
145  typedef typename View_block_storage<local_block_type>::plain_type
146                                                local_block_ret_type;
147  typedef Distributed_block<local_block_type, MapT> dst_block_type;
148
149  typedef typename View_of_dim<Dim, value_type, dst_block_type>::type
150		dst_view_type;
151  typedef typename View_of_dim<Dim, value_type, BlockT>::const_type
152		src_view_type;
153
154
155public:
156  Par_expr_block(MapT const& map, BlockT const& block)
157    : map_ (map),
158      blk_ (const_cast<BlockT&>(block))
159  {}
160
161  ~Par_expr_block() {}
162
163  void exec() {}
164
165  // Accessors.
166public:
167  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return blk_.size(); }
168  length_type size(dimension_type blk_dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
169  { return blk_.size(blk_dim, d); }
170
171  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
172  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
173
174  // Distributed Accessors
175public:
176  local_block_type& get_local_block() const
177    { return blk_; }
178
179  // Member data.
180private:
181  MapT const&     map_;
182  typename View_block_storage<BlockT>::expr_type blk_;
183};
184
185
186
187template <dimension_type Dim,
188	  typename       MapT,
189	  typename       BlockT>
190struct Is_sized_block<Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT, Peb_reuse_tag> >
191{ static bool const value = Is_sized_block<BlockT>::value; };

194
195template <typename RetBlock>
196struct Create_subblock;
197
198template <typename BlockT>
199struct Create_subblock<Subset_block<BlockT> >
200{
201  template <typename MapT>
202  static Subset_block<BlockT> exec(MapT const& map, BlockT const& blk)
203  {
204    dimension_type const dim = BlockT::dim;
205    return Subset_block<BlockT>
206      (map.template impl_global_domain<dim>(map.subblock(),0),blk);
207  }
208};
209
210template <typename MapT, typename BlockT>
211struct Create_subblock<Map_subset_block<BlockT,MapT> >
212{
213  static Map_subset_block<BlockT,MapT> exec(MapT const& map, BlockT const& blk)
214  {
215    return Map_subset_block<BlockT,MapT>(blk,map);
216  }
217};
218
219template <typename MapT, typename BlockT>
220struct Choose_local_block;
221
222template <typename BlockT, dimension_type Dim>
223struct Choose_local_block<Replicated_map<Dim>, BlockT>
224{
225  typedef Subset_block<BlockT> block_type;
226};
227
228template <typename BlockT, dimension_type Dim>
229struct Choose_local_block<Global_map<Dim>, BlockT>
230{
231  typedef Subset_block<BlockT> block_type;
232};
233
234template <typename BlockT>
235struct Choose_local_block<Map<Block_dist,Block_dist,Block_dist>, BlockT>
236{
237  typedef Subset_block<BlockT> block_type;
238};
239
240template <typename MapT, typename BlockT>
241struct Choose_local_block
242{
243  typedef Map_subset_block<BlockT,MapT> block_type;
244};

247template <dimension_type Dim,
248	  typename       MapT,
249	  typename       BlockT>
250class Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT, Peb_remap_tag> : Non_copyable
251{
252public:
253  static dimension_type const dim = Dim;
254
255  typedef typename BlockT::value_type           value_type;
256  typedef typename BlockT::reference_type       reference_type;
257  typedef typename BlockT::const_reference_type const_reference_type;
258  typedef MapT                                  map_type;
259
260
261  typedef typename Choose_local_block<MapT, BlockT const>::block_type
262                                                local_block_type;
263  typedef typename View_block_storage<local_block_type>::plain_type
264                                                local_block_ret_type;
265
266public:
267  Par_expr_block(MapT const& map, BlockT const& block)
268    : map_     (map),
269      blk_     (block),
270      subblock_(Create_subblock<local_block_type>::exec(map_,blk_))
271  {}
272
273  ~Par_expr_block() {}
274
275  void exec() {}
276
277  // Accessors.
278public:
279  length_type size() const VSIP_NOTHROW { return blk_.size(); }
280  length_type size(dimension_type blk_dim, dimension_type d) const VSIP_NOTHROW
281  { return blk_.size(blk_dim, d); }
282
283  void increment_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
284  void decrement_count() const VSIP_NOTHROW {}
285
286  // Distributed Accessors
287public:
288  local_block_ret_type get_local_block() const
289  {
290    return subblock_;
291  }
292
293
294  // Member data.
295private:
296  MapT const&                                          map_;
297  typename View_block_storage<BlockT const>::expr_type blk_;
298  local_block_type                                     subblock_;
299};
300
301
302/// 'Combine' functor to construct an expression of Par_expr_blocks from an
303/// expression of distributed blockes.
304
305/// get_par_expr_block() is a convenience function to apply this
306/// functor.
307
308template <dimension_type Dim,
309	  typename       MapT>
310class Create_par_expr
311{
312public:
313  template <typename BlockT>
314  struct tree_type
315  {
316    typedef Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT> type;
317  };
318
319  template <typename BlockT>
320  struct return_type
321  {
322    typedef Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT>& type;
323  };
324
325  // Constructors.
326public:
327  Create_par_expr(MapT const& map) : map_(map) {}
328
329  // Leaf combine function.
330  template <typename BlockT>
331  typename return_type<BlockT>::type
332  apply(BlockT const& block) const
333  {
334    return *(new Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT>(map_, block));
335  }
336
337  // Member data.
338private:
339  MapT const& map_;
340
341};
342
343
344
345/// 'Visitor' functor to call 'exec()' member function for each
346/// leaf in an expression.
347
348/// Expected to be used on expressions of Par_expr_blocks.
349
350class Exec_par_expr
351{
352  // Constructors.
353public:
354  Exec_par_expr() {}
355
356  // Leaf visitor function.
357  template <typename BlockT>
358  void
359  apply(BlockT const& block) const
360  {
361    // const_cast necessary because Expr_binary_block accessors for
362    // left() and right() return const.
363    const_cast<BlockT&>(block).exec();
364  }
365};
366
367
368
369/// 'Visitor' functor to delete each leaf block in an expression.
370
371/// Expected to be used on expressions of Par_expr_blocks.
372
373class Free_par_expr
374{
375  // Constructors.
376public:
377  Free_par_expr() {}
378
379  // Leaf visitor function.
380  template <typename BlockT>
381  void
382  apply(BlockT const& block) const
383  {
384    delete &block;
385  }
386};
387
388
389
390/// Represent and evaluate a parallel expression.
391template <dimension_type Dim,
392	  typename       DstBlock,
393	  typename       SrcBlock>
394class Par_expr
395{
396  // Compile-time values and typedefs.
397  typedef typename DstBlock::value_type value1_type;
398  typedef typename SrcBlock::value_type value2_type;
399
400  typedef typename DstBlock::map_type   dst_map_type;
401  typedef typename Distributed_local_block<DstBlock>::type dst_lblock_type;
402
403  typedef typename
404    Combine_return_type<Create_par_expr<Dim, dst_map_type>, SrcBlock>
405    ::tree_type src_peb_type;
406
407  typedef typename Distributed_local_block<src_peb_type>::type src_lblock_type;
408
409  // Constructors
410public:
411  Par_expr(
412    typename View_of_dim<Dim, value1_type, DstBlock>::type       dst,
413    typename View_of_dim<Dim, value2_type, SrcBlock>::const_type src)
414  : dst_      (dst),
415    src_remap_(get_par_expr_block<Dim>(dst.block().map(), src.block()))
416  {}
417
418  ~Par_expr()
419  { free_par_expr_block(src_remap_.block()); }
420
421  void operator()()
422  {
423    typedef typename View_of_dim<Dim, value1_type, dst_lblock_type>::type
424		dst_lview_type;
425    typedef typename View_of_dim<Dim, value2_type, src_lblock_type>::const_type
426		src_lview_type;
427
428    // Reorganize data to owner-computes
429    exec_par_expr_block(src_remap_.block());
430
431    DstBlock&      dst_block = dst_.block();
432
433    if (dst_block.map().subblock() != no_subblock)
434    {
435      dst_lview_type dst_lview = get_local_view(dst_);
436      src_lview_type src_lview = get_local_view(src_remap_);
437      
438#if 0
439      // This is valid if the local view is element conformant to the
440      // union of patches in corresponding subblock.
441      //
442      // Subset_maps do not meet this requirement currently.
443      // (061212).
444      dst_lview = src_lview;
445#else
446      typedef typename DstBlock::map_type map_type;
447      map_type const& map = dst_block.map();
448
449      index_type sb = map.subblock();
450
451      for (index_type p=0; p<map.impl_num_patches(sb); ++p)
452      {
453	Domain<Dim> dom = map.template impl_local_domain<Dim>(sb, p);
454	dst_lview(dom) = src_lview(dom);
455      }
456#endif
457    }
458  }
459
460  // Member data.
461private:
462  typename View_of_dim<Dim, value1_type, DstBlock>::type           dst_;
463  typename View_of_dim<Dim, value2_type, src_peb_type>::const_type src_remap_;
464};
465
466
467
468/// Specialize Distributed_local_block traits class for Par_expr_block.
469template <dimension_type Dim,
470	  typename       MapT,
471	  typename       BlockT>
472struct Distributed_local_block<Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT> >
473{
474  typedef typename Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT>::local_block_type
475		type;
476  typedef typename Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT>::local_block_type
477		proxy_type;
478};
479
480
481
482#if VSIP_IMPL_USE_GENERIC_VISITOR_TEMPLATES==0
483
484/// Determine return type for combining a leaf Par_expr_block.
485template <typename       CombineT,
486	  dimension_type Dim,
487	  typename       MapT,
488	  typename       BlockT>
489struct Combine_return_type<CombineT, Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT> >
490{
491  typedef Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT> block_type;
492  typedef typename CombineT::template return_type<block_type>::type
493		type;
494  typedef typename CombineT::template tree_type<block_type>::type
495		tree_type;
496};
497
498
499
500/// Specialize apply_combine for Par_expr_block leaves.
501template <typename       CombineT,
502	  dimension_type Dim,
503	  typename       MapT,
504	  typename       BlockT>
505typename Combine_return_type<CombineT,
506			     Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT> >::type
507apply_combine(
508  CombineT const&                          combine,
509  Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT> const& block)
510{
511  return combine.apply(block);
512}
513
514
515
516/// Specialize apply_leaf for Par_expr_block leaves.
517template <typename       VisitorT,
518	  dimension_type Dim,
519	  typename       MapT,
520	  typename       BlockT>
521void
522apply_leaf(
523  VisitorT const&                          visitor,
524  Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT> const& block)
525{
526  visitor.apply(block);
527}
528#endif
529
530

532/***********************************************************************
533  Definitions
534***********************************************************************/
535
536template <dimension_type Dim,
537	  typename       MapT,
538	  typename       BlockT>
539Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT, Peb_reorg_tag>::Par_expr_block(
540  MapT const&   map,
541  BlockT const& block)
542  : map_      (map),
543    dom_      (block_domain<Dim>(block)),
544    dst_block_(new dst_block_type(dom_, map_), noincrement),
545    dst_      (*dst_block_),
546    src_      (const_cast<BlockT&>(block)),
547    assign_   (dst_, src_)
548{
549}
550
551
552
553/// Overload of get_local_block for Par_expr_block.
554template <dimension_type Dim,
555	  typename       MapT,
556	  typename       BlockT,
557	  typename       ImplTag>
558typename Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT, ImplTag>::local_block_ret_type
559get_local_block(
560  Par_expr_block<Dim, MapT, BlockT, ImplTag> const& block)
561{
562  return block.get_local_block();
563}
564
565
566
567/// Convert an expression of distributed blocks into an expression
568/// of Par_expr_blocks
569template <dimension_type Dim,
570	  typename       MapT,
571	  typename       BlockT>
572typename Combine_return_type<Create_par_expr<Dim, MapT>, BlockT>::type
573get_par_expr_block(
574  MapT const&   map,
575  BlockT const& block)
576{
577  Create_par_expr<Dim, MapT> combine(map);
578  return apply_combine(combine, block);
579}
580
581
582
583/// Perform data reorganization for an expression of Par_expr_blocks
584template <typename BlockT>
585void
586exec_par_expr_block(
587  BlockT const& block)
588{
589  Exec_par_expr visitor;
590  apply_leaf(visitor, block);
591}
592
593
594
595/// Deallocate leaf Par_expr_blocks in expression.
596template <typename BlockT>
597void
598free_par_expr_block(
599  BlockT const& block)
600{
601  Free_par_expr visitor;
602  apply_leaf(visitor, block);
603}
604
605
606
607
608/// Evaluate a parallel expression where LHS and RHS have same mapping.
609///
610/// Arguments:
611///   :dst: a distributed, non-const view to assign to.
612///   :src: a distributed view of the same dimension as DST that holds
613///         the values to assign into DST.
614template <template <typename, typename> class View1,
615	  template <typename, typename> class View2,
616	  typename                            T1,
617	  typename                            Block1,
618	  typename                            T2,
619	  typename                            Block2>
620void
621par_expr_simple(View1<T1, Block1> dst,
622		View2<T2, Block2> src)
623{
624  VSIP_IMPL_STATIC_ASSERT((View1<T1, Block1>::dim == View2<T2, Block2>::dim));
625
626  typedef typename Distributed_local_block<Block1>::type dst_lblock_type;
627  typedef typename Distributed_local_block<Block2>::type src_lblock_type;
628
629  // Already checked by Dispatch_assign prior to calling:
630  //
631  // assert(Is_par_same_map<map_t, Block2>::value(dst.block().map(),
632  //                                              src.block()));
633
634  View1<T1, dst_lblock_type> dst_lview = get_local_view(dst);
635  View2<T2, src_lblock_type> src_lview = get_local_view(src);
636
637  dst_lview = src_lview;
638}
639
640
641
642/// Evaluate a parallel expression where LHS and RHS have different
643/// mappings.
644///
645/// Arguments:
646///   :dst: a distributed, non-const view to assign to.
647///   :src: a distributed view of the same dimension as DST that holds
648///         the values to assign into DST.
649template <template <typename, typename> class View1,
650	  template <typename, typename> class View2,
651	  typename                            T1,
652	  typename                            Block1,
653	  typename                            T2,
654	  typename                            Block2>
655void
656par_expr(View1<T1, Block1> dst,
657	 View2<T2, Block2> src)
658{
659  VSIP_IMPL_STATIC_ASSERT((View1<T1, Block1>::dim == View2<T2, Block2>::dim));
660  dimension_type const dim = View1<T1, Block1>::dim;
661
662  Par_expr<dim, Block1, Block2> par_expr(dst, src);
663
664  par_expr();
665}
666
667} // namespace vsip::impl
668} // namespace vsip
